samAsa: 1. SruwInAm suKam yEH we iwi SruwisuKAH - bahuvrIhi sa
2. BramarANAM svanAH iwi BramarasvanAH - RaRTI wawpuruRa
3. Bramarasvana eva gIwayaH - BramarasvanagIwayaH - avaXAraNa pUrvapaxa karmaXAraya sa
4. SruwisuKaBramarasvana gIwayaH yAsAm wAH iwi SruwisuKaBramarasvanagIwayaH - samAnAXikaraNa bahuvrIhi sa
2. xanwAnAm rucaH iwi xanwarucaH - RaRTI wawpuruRa samAsa
